item.title: Weekly Progress Log - Week 1
item.description:
Week starting: 12th Jan 2026

This week marked my return from a much-needed break spent doing the highly advanced technique known as touching grass. After a busy year, I came back feeling relaxed, refreshed, and in a surprisingly good mental state.

Instead of easing in gently, I decided to jump straight back in and see how rusty Iâ€™d become.

Took me a whole 2 hours to remember the master password to my password manager before I could log in anywhere. Never change your password before a long break. I didnt even remember why I changed it in the first place.

item.title: Behind the Mayhem: My PerfectRoot CTF 2025 Recap
item.description:
ðŸŽ‰ Lights, Camera, Chaos!

If you heard loud keyboard smashing on the weekend of December 5thâ€¦
yeah, that was probably us.

PerfectRoot CTF 2025 went live, thousands of players stormed the gates, the Discord server transformed into a marketplace of panic and memes, and somewhere in the background I was praying the infra wouldnâ€™t spontaneously combust.

Spoiler: it didnâ€™t.
Miracles do happen.

PerfectRoot CTF 2025 â€” My Behind-the-Scenes Recap (Organized Chaos Done Right)

PerfectRoot CTF 2025 is officially in the books â€” and wow, what a ride.
This yearâ€™s event wasnâ€™t just biggerâ€¦ it was louder, faster, and way more chaotic in the best possible way. If last year was a warm-up jog, this year was a sprint uphill while juggling flaming Docker containers.

item.title: Marked by Dust - ADHoc Intel Walkthrough
item.description:
ðŸ•¯ï¸ Marked by Dust

Category: OSINT

â€œTime has buried many secrets, but even in the dust, a precise place remains.â€

The Question says:

Every place has its special words; find the ones that belong to this artifact

Prologue â€” The Forgotten Door

It began with silence.
No coordinates, no hints â€” only an image.
A sun-scorched door of ancient wood, framed in cracked earth, its texture heavy with history. It stared back at the solver like a memory half-recalled, daring them to look closer.

item.title: Dig Deeper Walkthrough - Dewald Roode Cybersecurity Hackathon 2025
item.description:
ðŸ•³ï¸ Prologue: Whispers Beneath the Noise

In the endless expanse of the cyber realm, secrets rarely scream â€” they whisper. Steganography is the ancient art of these whispers: the delicate craft of hiding a truth so deeply that even when it is in plain sight, it remains unseen.

Where cryptography cloaks a message behind an unbreakable cipher, steganography conceals its very existence. A song that carries a confession in static. An image that smiles innocently while concealing a weapon beneath its pixels. A file that hums one story to the ear while hiding another for those patient enough to listen closer.

item.title: 3=crowd? - Bitwall CTF OSINT Walkthrough
item.description:
ðŸ•³ï¸ 3=crowd?

A journey into nothingness.

ðŸ•¯ï¸ Prologue

The screen flickered. No IP addresses to scan. No EXIF tags to scrub. No usernames to pivot from. Only a prompt:

â€œAll through time, we have strived to achieve precision in all our workings.
Come our beloved cyberspace, and nothing became one of the most important fundamentals of the entire industry.
Trace back its true origin and describe in three words that which is known to all yet unknown to all.â€

item.title: CyberDefenders: 3CX Supply Chain Attack
item.description:
Prologue: The Quiet Before the Storm

In the quietest moments of routine operations, danger often stirs. A trusted software update, something so mundane, becomes the entry point for a dark and malicious force. The 3CX Supply Chain Attackâ€”an incident where trust was manipulated, and a seemingly harmless software update became a weapon of digital warfare. Prepare yourself, for the tale is one of hidden danger, covert movements, and the eerie calm before a storm. Letâ€™s walk through this, step by step, through the veil of deceit and into the truth that lies beneath.
